content.description: This has creative, balancy climbing. Find your way through the delicate foot work to the jugs.
content.location:
It is the second route from the left, right next to

Once Bitten

.

climbs.name: Paranoid
climbs.fa: Will Scott, Ben Butler, and Josh Carey

content.description: Climb past slabby rock and an odd sequence to the second bolt. Another thin section beneath the roof leads to better hold. Test holds in the roof.
content.location:
This is the third route from the right. It is very close to

Das Krankenhaus

.

content.description: Is this the best route at Halfway? Maybe if it was longer. It definitely has the most solid rock at the crag. Follow bolts and crimps up the black slab reaching a series of small ledges. If the leader is sketchin', the belay should be heads up till after the third clip .
content.location: This is the leftmost, shortest route at Halfway.

climbs.name: Godzilla
climbs.fa: Will Scott, Ben Butler, and Josh Carey

content.description: This is the test piece for the cliff. It is balancy, delicate, and challenging. It is guaranteed to make you think. Climb the slab through a small overlap to anchors above.
content.location: This is the third climb from the left.
This is where the trail hits the rock.

content.description:
The trail brings you to the base of this route. The first two bolts are shared with

Dealer's Choice Right

. Climb up angling left after the 2nd bolt. Be on the look out for loose holds moving through the roof band.
content.location: Where the trail hits the wall, look for two shared bolts diverging into two routes.

climbs.name: Das Krankenhaus
climbs.fa: Will Scott, Ben Butler, and Josh Carey

content.description: Thin, slabby climbing leads to two over laps. This is fun and varied. Be careful of loose rock in the roofs, the 2nd roof has a block that will most likely go airborne in the future.
content.location:
This is the first route to the right of

DCR

and

DCL

.

content.description:
This is probably the best 5.9 at Halfway. It is definitely the cleanest. Climb up the minor arete at the bottom to the face and crux up top. A few longer draws might be nice higher up. This shares anchors with

Boomerang

.
content.location: This is the second route from the right.

content.description:
This has interesting and fun climbing up a right-arching feature. Unfortunately the rock is the worst at the cliff. Test holds carefully. This shares anchors with

Chicken Spider

. Please use care to reduce erosion below this climb.
content.location: This is the furthest right climb at the cliff. Ascend a blocky, arching feature.
